snippet: The closure of macro hedge funds run by Bain Capital and Fortress Investment does not mean bad news for the industry. Lesser-known funds have had double-digit growth.
abstract: Renaissance Technologies announces it is shutting down Renaissance Institutional Futures Fund, latest in series of closures of macro hedge funds due to what firms say is result of recent global market turmoil; in spite of trend, some lesser-known macro-focused hedge funds like Element Capital Management and Atreaus Capital report double-digit gains for investors this year.
lead_paragraph: The closure of macro hedge funds run by Bain Capital and Fortress Investment does not mean bad news for the industry. Lesser-known funds have had double-digit growth.

headline.main: As Some Hedge Funds Sink, the Challenge Buoys Others
headline.print_headline: As Some Hedge Funds Sink, the Challenge Buoys Others
